1. This is our first problem
```{r}
library(nycflights13)

flights %>% filter(arr_delay >= 3*60)
```

2. This is our second problem

```{r}
flights %>% filter(dest %in% c("IAH", "HOU")) %>% head() #or
flights %>% filter(dest == "IAH" | dest == "HOU") %>% head()
```
